roleset.name: antagonistic, overly aggressive
roleset.note: HOSTILE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from hostile.01-j)
HOSTILITIES-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from hostilities.01-n)

example.name: both args
example.text: In the last few days , Hillary also hopped over to Myanmar , which they have been hostile towards for 20 years , and said it was to promote reform in Myanmar , but secretly what they want to do is " the villain 's plan is obvious to all " .
